data.title: Education Session: David Fisher
data.text:
Reach Down. Reach In. Reach Out.

Believe it! You are more influential than you think! The rest is easy. Find your purpose. Discover your story. Re-write it, if you must. And then get ready to change the world, including your own.

When you learn the art of storytelling and how it converges with the science of communication, you will cultivate deeper relationships that extend much farther than you can imagine!

David's education session will show you:

How to empower yourself.

Learning how the story you tell yourself can make a positive impact in the world.

How through communication, understanding and deeper connections, you can improve your personal and professional life and that of those around you.

Bio

David Fisher is an award-winning speaker, coach, and story amplifier. The LA Weekly listed him as a Top 30 entrepreneur to watch in 2023. Yahoo Finance rated David a Top 10 speaking coach in 2020 and 2022.

David has spoken at multiple international events. In addition to speaking and coaching at several TedX events, David has coached speakers for Tony Robbins Power of Success, Humanizing the Homeless (Toronto), Volcano E, Future V, and the Global Conference of Governance in Dubai.

David graduated with high honors in speech communications from Wayne State University, is a Certified Life Coach from Rhodes Wellness College, is a Life Story, and Goal Setting Coach, and a certified Xperientialâ„¢ coach.

David was a member of the Screen Actors Guild and has several acting film credits to his name.

He has inspired thousands worldwide to create more impactful connections through communication and storytelling.

View David's Speaker Reel here.
